Sentencas: A solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) system integrated with an ethanol steam reforming unit is evaluated considering the first and second laws of thermodynamics.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of an ethanol fueled solid oxide fuel cell power plant

Sentencas: The ethanol reaction kinetic data and system architecture were developed in two previous communications.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of an ethanol fueled solid oxide fuel cell power plant

Sentencas: The irreversibility losses distribution and the plant energy and exergy efficiencies are studied at different reformer temperatures (823 < T < 973 K), water to ethanol molar ratios (5 < R-AE < 6.5) and fuel utilization factor (0.7 < U-f < 0.9).
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of an ethanol fueled solid oxide fuel cell power plant

Sentencas: The post-combustion of the cell off gases for the heat recovery is also taken into account to maintain the system operation within the auto-sustainability boundaries.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of an ethanol fueled solid oxide fuel cell power plant

Sentencas: An increase of efficiency and irreversibility at the stack is reported when the reactants ratio is increased.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of an ethanol fueled solid oxide fuel cell power plant

Sentencas: The higher losses are placed at the steam reformer (280-350 kW) and the cell (400-590 kW) due to the combination of the chemical composition and stream conditions on chemical and physical components of the exergy.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of an ethanol fueled solid oxide fuel cell power plant
